long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hover Notepad is a lightweight, semi-transparent notepad that floats on any webpage. Perfect for jotting down quick notes, ideas, or important information while browsing. 

Key features:
• Auto-saves your notes as you type across each tab
• Semi-transparent design that doesn't obstruct your view
• Download your notes as a text file
• Clear notes with a single click

Boost your productivity and never lose an important thought while browsing again!
